name: Underboss
description:
This project is a mobile game developed in a college class. It's a small boss fight similar to something you'd find in a game like Binding of Isaac. It can be played on PC or mobile, using platform-specific controls for each, but it is best played on PC.

The main goal of this project is to display the execution of proper protocol regarding project documentation, unit testing, project structuring (MVC), and other appropriate protocols for a mobile game developed with object-oriented programming. The repository for this game, with all of this info and source code, can be found here: https://github.com/JoaoAlvaroFerreira/FEUP-LPOO-Underboss/
